sorcer.provider.boot

Class Booter

  • java.lang.Object
    • sorcer.provider.boot.Booter
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    SorcerConstants

    public class Booter
extends java.lang.Object
implements SorcerConstants
    Provides static convenience methods for use in configuration files. This class cannot be instantiated.
    Author:
    Dennis Reedy and Mike Sobolewski

    • Field Summary

      Fields 
      Modifier and Type Field and Description
      static java.lang.String PROVIDER_PROPERTIES_FILENAME
      Default name 'provider.properties' for a file defining provider properties.

    • Method Detail

      • getClasspath

        public static java.lang.String getClasspath(java.lang.String[] jars)
        Return the classpath for the provided JAR names.
        Parameters:
        jars - Array of JAR names
        Returns:
        The classpath with system dependent path delimiters

      • getCodebase

        public static java.lang.String getCodebase(java.lang.String jar,
                                           java.lang.String port)
                                    throws java.net.UnknownHostException
        Return the codebase for the provided JAR name and port. This method will first get the IP Address of the machine using java.net.InetAddress.getLocalHost().getHostAddress(), then construct the codebase using the host address and the port for the provided jar.
        Parameters:
        jar - The JAR to use
        port - The port to use when constructing the codebase
        Returns:
        the codebase for the JAR
        Throws:
        java.net.UnknownHostException - if no IP address for the local host could be found.

      • getCodebase

        public static java.lang.String getCodebase(java.lang.String[] jars,
                                           java.lang.String port)
                                    throws java.net.UnknownHostException
        Return the codebase for the provided JAR names and port. This method will first get the IP Address of the machine using java.net.InetAddress.getLocalHost().getHostAddress(), then construct the codebase using the host address and the port for each jar in the array of jars.
        Parameters:
        jars - The JAR names to use
        port - The port to use when constructing the codebase
        Returns:
        The codebase as a space-delimited String for the provided JARs
        Throws:
        java.net.UnknownHostException - if no IP address for the local host could be found.

      • getCodebase

        public static java.lang.String getCodebase(java.lang.String jar,
                                           java.lang.String address,
                                           java.lang.String port)
        Return the codebase for the provided JAR name, port and address
        Parameters:
        jar - The JAR to use
        address - The address to use when constructing the codebase
        port - The port to use when constructing the codebase
        Returns:
        the codebase for the JAR

      • getHostAddress

        public static java.lang.String getHostAddress(java.lang.String name)
                                       throws java.net.UnknownHostException
        Return the local host address for a passed in host using InetAddress.getByName(String)
        Parameters:
        name - The name of the host to return
        Returns:
        The local host address
        Throws:
        java.net.UnknownHostException - if no IP address for the host name could be found.

      • getHostAddressFromProperty

        public static java.lang.String getHostAddressFromProperty(java.lang.String property)
                                                   throws java.net.UnknownHostException
        Return the local host address based on the eval of a system property. using InetAddress.getByName(String). If the system property is not resolvable, return the default host address obtained from InetAddress.getLocalHost()
        Parameters:
        property - The property name to use
        Returns:
        The local host address
        Throws:
        java.net.UnknownHostException - if no IP address for the host name could be found.

        Returns:

        Throws:

        public static java.net.URL fileToURL(java.lang.String filePath)
                              throws java.net.MalformedURLException
        Get an URL from a fully qualified file path
        Parameters:
        filePath - A fully qualified file path
        Returns:
        The URL from the file if the file exists
        Throws:
        java.net.MalformedURLException - If the filePath cannot be converted

      • toURLs

        public static java.net.URL[] toURLs(java.lang.String[] elements)
                             throws java.net.MalformedURLException
        Will return an array of URLs based on the input String array. If the array element is a file, the fully qualified file path must be provided. If the array element is a directory, a fully qualified directory path must be provided, and the directory will be searched for all .jar and .zip files
        Parameters:
        elements - A String array of fully qualified directory path
        Returns:
        An URL[] elements
        Throws:
        java.net.MalformedURLException - if any of the elements cannot be converted

      • scanDirectory

        public static java.net.URL[] scanDirectory(java.lang.String dirPath)
                                    throws java.net.MalformedURLException
        Will return an array of URLs for all .jar and .zip files in the directory, including the directory itself
        Parameters:
        dirPath - A fully qualified directory path
        Returns:
        A URL[] for all .jar and .zip files in the directory, including the directory itself
        Throws:
        java.net.MalformedURLException - If elements in the directory cannot be created into a URL

      • parseOverrides

        public static java.lang.String[] parseOverrides(java.lang.String propertiesFile)
                                         throws java.io.IOException
        Read the properties file and return an array of String instances which can be used as Jini configuration overrides
        Parameters:
        propertiesFile - A Properties file containing override declarations
        Returns:
        An array of String values suitable for use as Jini configuration overrides. If the propeties file is empty return a zero-length array
        Throws:
        java.lang.NullPointerException - if propertiesFile is null
        java.io.IOException - if the Properties file cannot be read

      • parseOverrides

        public static java.lang.String[] parseOverrides(java.lang.String propertiesFile,
                                                java.lang.String[] components)
                                         throws java.io.IOException
        Read the properties file and return an array of String instances which can be used as Jini configuration overrides
        Parameters:
        propertiesFile - A Properties file containing override declarations
        components - An array of components to match, maty be null. If not null, then if a key starts with an element in the provided components array it will be part of the array of overrides returned. If this parameter is null or zero-length, all property components are returned
        Returns:
        An array of String values suitable for use as Jini configuration overrides. If there are no matching components or the properties file is empty return a zero-length array
        Throws:
        java.lang.NullPointerException - if propertiesFile is null
        java.io.IOException - if the Properties file cannot be read

      • createConfigArgs

        public static java.lang.String[] createConfigArgs(java.lang.String configFile,
                                                  java.lang.String[] overrides)
        Assemble a String array suitable for use as Jini configuration options. The String array whose first element is the configuration source and remaining elements specify override values for args
        Parameters:
        configFile - The location of the configuration file, must not be null
        overrides - Array of elements specifying override values for args, mat be null
        Returns:
        A String array suitable for use as a Jini configuration
        Throws:
        java.lang.NullPointerException - if configFile is null

      • getAnonymousPort

        public static int getAnonymousPort()
                            throws java.io.IOException
        Get an anonymous port
        Returns:
        An anonymous port created by instantiating a java.net.ServerSocket with a port of 0
